content: विलंब् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To hang down, hang from, be suspended from; <ls>R. 10. 62.</ls> {@--2@} To set, decline (as the sun &c.). {@--3@} To stay or lag behind, stay or remain, wait, stand still, तां प्राङ्मुखीं तत्र निवेश्य तन्वीं क्षणं व्यलबंत पुरो निषण्णाः <ls>Ku. 7. 13.</ls> {@--4@} To delay, be retarded; विलांबितफलैः कालं निनाय स मनोरथैः <ls>R. 1. 33</ls>; किं विलंव्यते त्वरितं तं प्रवेशय <ls>U. 1.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To delay, detain. {@--2@} To put off, retard, procrastinate, postpone. {@--3@} To waste, lose.
